summary:
JOIN THE Mode AIRDROP - Mode is the Ethereum L2 that rewards you for growing the network via new economic mechanisms. Powered by Optimism.

 Onchain Economy - Mode is building a new onchain economy that rewards contribution to network growth.

 Sequencer fee sharing - Developers earn a proportion of sequencer fees that go through their contracts.

 SMART TREASURY - Mode’s smart treasury will power automated rewards across the ecosystem.

 10x Lower Fees than Ethereum - Powered and supported by Optimism. Mode is built on the Modular OP Stack and is a member of the Superchain alongside Base and OP Mainnet.

 The Mode Ecosystem - Join the top builders in the space as we scale Mode together.

 Kim - Kim is a flagship DEX that is natively built on Mode to provide users with superb trading experiences.

 Mode NS - Experience seamless, user-centric blockchain engagement on the Mode network with Mode Name Service.

 Ionic - Ionic is a decentralised non-custodial money market protocol with the best interest rates on Mode Network.
